message: ...But the reprieve is brief.
Another dog, just like the first one, appears at the end of the hall.
No, not one. Several!

name: ノイズ
message: "Tch, more of 'em. Can you run?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: ノイズ
message: "Let's find somewhere to hide and wait for them to pass."
Holding my aching side, I run down the hall beside Noiz.
We find a door with a small glass window and peer inside.
It looks like a storage room. More importantly, it's empty.
We slip into the room and hide ourselves between the neatly organized shelves.
Holding our breath, we listen closely for any sound from outside.
Amid the tension, I can just barely hear the sound of the dogs' footsteps.
The footsteps reach the door... and stop.
After a few moments, they start again, this time moving away.
...Phew...

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Haah."
I let out a heavy sigh of relief.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That was close."
I look at Noiz. He's staring into space, as if searching for an answer to some question.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz?"

name: ノイズ
message: "...I don't get it."
He turns to me.
His stare is so piercing, I have to shrink back.
